info.title: MOH TIME OS API
info.description: Personal Operating System API - Direct control without AI

get.description:

Spec: 7.1 Client Index

Spec: 7.2 Active Client Detail, 7.9 Include Policy

Returns inbox items with counts. Counts are always global (ignore filters).

GET /api/v2/inbox/recent

Spec: 7.10 Recently Actioned Tab

get.description: Health check endpoint.

post.description:
Run snooze expiry job.

Spec: 6.5 Snooze Timer Execution

get.description:
GET /api/v2/priorities

Alias to /api/priorities for frontend compatibility.

GET /api/v2/projects

Alias to /api/projects for frontend compatibility.

GET /api/v2/events

Alias to /api/events for frontend compatibility.

GET /api/v2/invoices

Global invoices endpoint for frontend compatibility.
GET /api/v2/proposals
GET /api/v2/watchers
GET /api/v2/couplings
GET /api/v2/fix-data

Get critical items only (IMMEDIATE urgency proposals).

The "30-second scan" view — what needs attention right now.
Faster than full snapshot.

Get daily briefing summary.

Returns structured briefing with:
- Summary counts (immediate, this_week, monitor)
- Critical items list
- Attention items list
- Watching items list
- Portfolio health
- Top proposal headline

Cached for 300 seconds (5 minutes).

Detect all active signals.

Returns signals with severity, entity, evidence, and implied action.

Get signal summary (counts by severity and state).

Cached for 60 seconds.
Get currently active signals from state tracking.
Get signal history for an entity.

Detect all active patterns.

Returns structural patterns across entities:
- Concentration (revenue, resource, communication)
- Cascade (blast radius, dependency chains)
- Degradation (quality, engagement erosion)
- Drift (workload, ownership)
- Correlation (load-quality, comm-payment)
Get pattern library (all defined patterns with detection logic).

Get ranked proposals.

Returns proposals sorted by priority score with:
- Headline, summary, entity
- Evidence list
- Implied action
- Urgency and confidence

Get scorecard for a client.

Returns composite score and dimension scores:
- Operational health
- Financial health
- Communication health
- Engagement trajectory

Get scorecard for a project.

Returns composite score and dimension scores:
- Velocity
- Risk exposure
- Team coverage
- Scope control

Get scorecard for a person.

Returns composite score and dimension scores:
- Load balance
- Output consistency
- Spread
- Availability risk

Get portfolio scorecard.

Returns composite score and dimension scores:
- Revenue concentration
- Resource concentration
- Client health distribution
- Capacity utilization

Get complete intelligence for a client.

Returns everything the system knows:
- Scorecard
- Active signals
- Signal history
- Trajectory
- Related proposals

Get complete intelligence for a person.

Returns everything the system knows:
- Scorecard
- Active signals
- Signal history
- Operational profile

Get portfolio-level intelligence.

Lighter than full snapshot:
- Portfolio score
- Signal summary
- Structural patterns
- Top proposals

Get operational state of a project.

Returns project info, task metrics (total, open, completed, overdue),
completion_rate_pct, and assigned people count.

Get deep operational profile for a client.

Returns client info, financial metrics, projects list,
people involved, and recent invoices.

Get operational profile for a person.

Returns person info, load metrics, projects they're on,
and clients they work with.

Get trajectory analysis for a client.

Shows metrics over rolling time windows with trend analysis
(increasing/stable/declining) for each metric.

parameters.name: window_days

schema.description: Size of each time window in days
schema.title: Window Days

parameters.description: Size of each time window in days

get.description:
Get trajectory analysis for a person.

Shows load and activity over rolling time windows with trend analysis.

parameters.name: window_days

schema.description: Size of each time window in days
schema.title: Window Days

parameters.description: Size of each time window in days

post.description:
POST /api/v2/proposals/:id/snooze

Snooze a proposal for N days.

POST /api/v2/proposals/:id/dismiss

Dismiss a proposal.

POST /api/v2/watchers/:id/dismiss

Dismiss a watcher.

POST /api/v2/watchers/:id/snooze

Snooze a watcher for N hours.

POST /api/v2/fix-data/:type/:id/resolve

Resolve a fix-data item (identity conflict or ambiguous link).

POST /api/v2/issues/:id/notes

Add a note to an issue.

patch.description:
PATCH /api/v2/issues/:id/resolve

Resolves an issue. Translates to the existing transition logic.

PATCH /api/v2/issues/:id/state

Changes issue state. Maps to the existing transition logic.

get.description: GET /api/v2/evidence/{entity_type}/{entity_id}

Get portfolio overview with all clients and their operational metrics.

Returns clients with project_count, total_tasks, active_tasks,
invoice_count, total_invoiced, total_outstanding, etc.

Cached for 120 seconds.

Get structural risks across the portfolio.

Returns risks categorized as OVERDUE_PROJECT, OVERLOADED_PERSON,
AGING_INVOICE with severity (HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW) and evidence.

parameters.name: overdue_threshold

schema.description: Min overdue tasks to flag project
schema.title: Overdue Threshold

parameters.description: Min overdue tasks to flag project

get.description:
Get trajectory analysis for all clients.

Shows direction of travel (increasing/stable/declining) for each client
based on rolling time windows.

parameters.name: window_days

schema.description: Size of each time window in days
schema.title: Window Days

parameters.description: Size of each time window in days

get.description:
Get task summary for a client.

Returns total_tasks, active_tasks, completed_tasks, overdue_tasks,
completion_rate, tasks_by_status, tasks_by_assignee.

Get communication metrics for a client.

Returns total_communications, by_type breakdown, and recent messages.

Compare a client's metrics between two time periods.

Returns metrics for each period, deltas, and percentage changes.

Compare all clients between two time periods.

Returns list of clients with their metrics in each period and deltas.

Get team load distribution.

Returns list of people with assigned_tasks, active_tasks,
project_count, and computed load_score (0-100).

Get team capacity overview.

Returns total_people, total_active_tasks, avg_tasks_per_person,
people_overloaded, people_available, and full distribution.

Get all projects ranked by health score.

health_score = completion_rate - (overdue_ratio * 50)
Higher is healthier.

Get invoice aging report.

Returns total_outstanding, by_bucket breakdown (current, 30, 60, 90+),
and list of clients with overdue amounts.

Get complete intelligence snapshot.

Runs the full intelligence pipeline:
- Scores all entities
- Detects all signals
- Detects all patterns
- Generates and ranks proposals
- Produces daily briefing

This is a heavy endpoint (~45s). Use targeted endpoints for faster responses.
Cached for 60 seconds.

Export all current signal detections as CSV for threshold tuning review.

Returns CSV data with signal_id, severity, entity, metric,
current_value, threshold_value, etc.
Get current threshold configuration for all signals.

Get score history for an entity.

Returns historical scores with trend analysis:
- history: list of {date, score, classification}
- trend: 'improving', 'declining', 'stable', or 'insufficient_data'
- change_pct: percentage change over the period
- current_score, period_high, period_low

Get summary of score history data collection.

Shows total records, breakdown by entity type, and recent recording activity.
Useful for monitoring data health.

post.description:
Record current scores for all entities.

This endpoint triggers score recording for trend tracking.
Should be called once per day (e.g., via cron).

Returns counts of recorded scores by entity type.

Cache invalidation: Clears all intelligence:* cache entries after recording.

get.description:
Run change detection and return delta report.

Compares current state to last saved snapshot.
Returns new/cleared signals, new proposals, score changes.

Server-Sent Events endpoint for real-time data push.

Returns SSE stream with events:
- signal_new: New signal detected
- resolution_update: Resolution queue item changed
- metric_refresh: Dashboard metrics updated
- system_status: Heartbeat/connection status

Keep-alive heartbeat sent every 30 seconds.

Get recent event history.

Returns the last N events (default 100).
Useful for initial state sync or when SSE unavailable.

post.description:
Publish a test event to the stream.

For testing/demo purposes. In production, events are published
by the system's internal event producers.

get.description:
Get paginated list of tasks.

Query parameters:
- page: Page number (default 1)
- page_size: Items per page (default 50, max 500)

Falls back to demo data if live DB is unavailable.

Get paginated list of signals.

Query parameters:
- page: Page number (default 1)
- page_size: Items per page (default 50, max 500)

Falls back to demo data if live DB is unavailable.

Get paginated list of clients.

Query parameters:
- page: Page number (default 1)
- page_size: Items per page (default 50, max 500)

Falls back to demo data if live DB is unavailable.

Get paginated list of invoices.

Query parameters:
- page: Page number (default 1)
- page_size: Items per page (default 50, max 500)

Falls back to demo data if live DB is unavailable.

post.description:
Request bulk data export.

Returns request_id to check status later.

get.description: Check export status and get download link.
List available tables for export with metadata.
Get schema for a specific table.

post.description:
Create a new subject access request.

GDPR compliance: Articles 15 (access), 17 (deletion), 16 (rectification), 20 (portability).

Returns request_id for tracking.

parameters.name: subject_identifier

schema.description: Email, name, or ID of data subject
schema.title: Subject Identifier

parameters.description: Email, name, or ID of data subject

get.description: List all subject access requests with optional status filter.
Get status of a subject access request.

post.description:
Fulfill a subject access request.

Supports:
- find: Search for all subject data
- export: Export subject data to file
- delete: Delete subject data (dry-run by default)
- anonymize: Anonymize subject data instead of delete

Args:
    request_id: The SAR request ID
    action: What to do (find, export, delete, anonymize)
    dry_run: If true, only simulate (default true for destructive ops)

Returns:
    Details of the action result

get.description:
Query the audit log for governance operations.

Returns all operations on a subject or of a specific action type.

post.description: Propose a new action for approval.
Batch propose multiple actions.
Approve a pending action.
Reject a pending action.
Execute an approved action.

get.description: Get pending actions awaiting approval.
Get action execution history.

post.description:
Receive and process Chat webhook events.

Handles:
- MESSAGE events (including slash commands starting with /)
- ADDED_TO_SPACE events
- REMOVED_FROM_SPACE events
- Other Chat events

For slash commands, routes to SlashCommandHandler.

Handle interactive card button clicks.

When user clicks a button on a card, Google Chat sends an interactive action event.
The action contains actionMethodName and parameters.

post.description: Archive tasks that are >30 days overdue.
Archive tasks that are 14-30 days overdue.
Recalculate priorities for all pending tasks.

Clean up legacy signals and proposals by:
1. Expiring signals for tasks overdue > LEGACY_OVERDUE_THRESHOLD_DAYS
2. Recalculating proposals without legacy noise

This fixes the issue of 1000+ day old overdue tasks polluting the dashboard.

get.description: Get task dependency graph.

Get proposals with full hierarchy context.

Args:
    limit: Max proposals to return
    status: Filter by status (open, snoozed, dismissed, accepted)
    days: Filter to signals within last N days (1=today, 7=week, 30=month)
    client_id: Filter to signals for a specific client (optional)
    member_id: Filter to signals for tasks assigned to this team member (optional)

Returns:
    items: List of proposals with:
        - scope_level, scope_name (project/client level)
        - client_name, client_tier
        - score, score_breakdown
        - signal_summary (counts by category)
        - worst_signal (text description)
        - signal_count, remaining_count

Get issues from real data in moh_time_os.db.

Args:
    limit: Max issues to return
    days: Filter to issues active within last N days
    client_id: Filter to issues for a specific client (optional)
    member_id: Filter to issues for tasks assigned to this team member (optional)

ActionStatusResponse.title: ActionStatusResponse
ActionStatusResponse.description: Response for action status changes (propose, approve, reject).

BatchProposalRequest.title: BatchProposalRequest
BatchProposalRequest.description: Request to batch propose multiple actions.

type.title: Type
type.description: Event type: MESSAGE, ADDED_TO_SPACE, REMOVED_FROM_SPACE, etc.

ChatWebhookResponse.title: ChatWebhookResponse
ChatWebhookResponse.description: Google Chat webhook response — text reply or card payload.

DetailResponse.title: DetailResponse
DetailResponse.description: Single entity detail — shape varies per entity type.

FixDataResponse.title: FixDataResponse
FixDataResponse.description: Data quality issues for manual resolution.

action.title: Action
action.description: Action details with actionMethodName and parameters

InteractiveActionRequest.title: InteractiveActionRequest
InteractiveActionRequest.description: Incoming interactive action (button click on card).

has_next.title: Has Next
has_next.description: Whether there is a next page

has_prev.title: Has Prev
has_prev.description: Whether there is a previous page
